data.title: narrated orchestral work based on the Tennyson epic idyll…
data.meta_description: Morte d'Arthur - narrated orchestral work based on the Tennyson epic idyll - script, orchestra score and parts available now from United Music Publishing Ltd.
data.text:
"Lord of the Flies" is now available in a new and exciting 70th Anniversary Publication of Wilkinson’s musical adaptation of the novel by Nobel Prize-winning author William Golding. The music is scored for a large orchestra and comes from United Music Publishing Ltd. with the support of the William Golding Estate Ltd.

Chamber Music - The Trio, Aus dem Dunkel, for Mezzo-Soprano, French horn and Piano, published by UMP Ltd., is now archived in the New York Public Library and the German National Library (Katalog der Deutschen Nationalbibliothek.) https://lnkd.in/eeNwyyfg

https://lnkd.in/eQr6FQ97 Building a catalogue at the New York Public Library. 'Aus dem Dunkel', trio for mezzo-soprano, French horn and piano: musical setting of the poem by Gertrud Kolmar, sung in the original German. Published by UMP Ltd. https://lnkd.in/eeNwyyfg

Season’s greetings! Please get in touch with me via LinkedIn or the contact page on my website. Twitter is no longer suitable and is assuredly, 'X'.

Trinity College London Piano Diploma Anthology. This unique collection contains 21 pieces from the ATCL repertoire list for Music Performance Diplomas in Piano. The most popular recital choices join lesser-known treasures, allowing performers to create diverse and compelling programmes, whether preparing for a Trinity diploma or not. https://lnkd.in/gYNq2g8j
